name: RAW SHEA BUTTER SOAP WITH FANKINCENSE, MYRRH AND GRAINS OF INDONESIAN SANDALWOOD
description:
Shea butter, commonly known as karate is derived from the shea nut tree (butyros perum parkil) which grows in the western region of Africa. This all natural product has been around for centuries. She butter evens the skin tone. It also moisturizes and protects the skin. Naturally rich in vitamins A, E and F which are some essential vitamins needed for good skin balance. We've combined Frankincense, Myrrh and Sandalwood to strengthen and enliven the skin cells. These ancient and sacred oils soothing and astringent action makes it excellent for relieving a wide variety of skin conditions including acne, sensitive skin, oily or dry wrinkled, chapped and cracked skin.

Key Ingredients: Water, Shea Butter, Wheat, Sandalwood and Frankincense & Myrrh, Love & Good Intentions

name: Island Coconut and Mango Butter Soap with Kiwi Seed Extract
description:
Coconut oil is easily absorbed by the skin, therefore penetrating the deeper layer of the skin and strengthening the underlying tissues. It will also aid in removing the outer layer of dead skin cells, making the skin smoother, softer and yet not oily. Studies have shown that coconut oil can bring temporary relief to skin and will aid in healing and repairing. Mango butter is obtained from kernels of the mango tree. It is packed full of beneficial antioxidants to keep your skin looking smooth and young. We've included kiwi seeds to gently exfoliate and buff away your dead skin cells.

Key Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Coconut oil, Mango seed butter, Kiwi seed extract, Love & Good Intentions

name: Frankincense and Myrrh Body Lotion (8 0z)
description: Excellent for relieving a wide variety of skin conditions including acne, sensitive, oily, dry, wrikled, chapped and cracked skin.

name: Pomegranate & Green Tea with Grated Lemon Peel Body Wash (8 oz)
description:
Our skin softening body wash goes on smoothly while rehydrating your skin and restoring it's luster and supple softness. Can be used daily to achieve soft youthful skin and an even complexion.
100% natural. 100% vegan. Leaves you sparkling clean and refreshed while nourishing your skin with vitamins, antioxidants and skin brightening fruits. No harsh detergents, no synthetic chemicals, no artificial fragrances or any other toxins that can strip, irritate or dehydrate your delicate skin. Truly, 100% pure. pH balanced. Cruelty free. Made with Love and Good Intentions!

8 ounces

Namaste
Qiyamah

name: Hair Milk (Daily Leave In Conditioner)
description:
This botanically rich, multi purpose leave in conditioner moisturizes, hydrates, adds shine, detangles and defines your tresses. Can be used daily or weekly to revitalize all.

Ingredients: Purified water, Shea Butter, Jojoba, Sweet Almond & Avocado Oil, Vitamin E, Panthenol, Calendula & Amica Flowers, Sage, Comfrey Root, Echinacea, Horsetail, Marshmallow Root & Nettle Extracts, Liquid Silk, Vegetable Emulsifying  Wax, Vegetable Glycerin, Aloe vera Juice Fragrance, Love and Good intentions. 

Directions: Apply a generous amount to wet or dry hair and proceed to style

name: Got Me Twisted Curly Jelly (8oz)
description:
Provides curl definition, Sheen, Hold and easy Detaingling.
"Bring out the natural curl pattern in any hair type and release your inner curly!!!!!

     "Appreciate Nature's Blessings"

name: Strawberry and Banana Shea Souffle'
description:
Strawberry and Banana shea butter souffle is a rich, creamy concoction that was inspired by mixtress Qiyamah's wonderful vacation at Paradise Islands in the Bahama's. While lounging at the pool bar - she continuously ordered one of her favorite frozen drinks virgin Strawberry and Banana Pina Colada. This luxurious body butter is packed to the punch with a beautiful blend of natural butters, fruit and nut oils and lots of love! 

Ingredients: Shea butter, almond oil, aloe vera oil, fragrance and love!

Suggested Usage: Apply directly to your damp skin daily after shower/bath. Can be used as a traditional body butter, hand and foot cream. 

8 oz - $12.00

name: Herbal Shea & Olive Hair Butter 8oz
description:
Herbal Shea & Olive Hair Butter is an emulsion of thick rich butters infused with essential herbs. This butter softens, conditions and adds a natural sheen to your hair. Although the butter can be used on all hair types, it is especially great for fragile and stressed out hair. A dab goes a long way, use a liberal amount as needed.

8 oz

name: African Black Soap  8oz
description:
African Black Soap has been prized for centuries for its natural healing properties. This natural gentle soap is highly sought after because of the lore surrounding its great healing properties of skin conditions. African Black Soap is used for cleaning skin, hair, and can even be used to wash dishes!It lathers beautifully, helps detoxify the skin and is so gentle on the body.

Immaculate Collections LLC... sells African Black Soap in both the solid and liquid form.

name: Herbal Hair Pomade
description:
Immaculate Collections Herbal Hand Made Hair Pomade:

Conditioner-Restorer-Root builder 
Ingredients: Nettle, Saliva Apiana Leaf, Black Walnut Hull, Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Beeswax, Jojoba Oil, Sesame Oil, Essential Oil of Rosemary and Sage, Hibiscus, Natural Fragrance and Lots Of Love! 
Wash Hair - Let Dry - Massage Scalp - apply pomade to hair. Use as desired!
This product is also excellent for dry skin and chapped lips.

FYI - This product is handmade with GOOD INTENTION!

4 oz

name: Tahitian Lime Restorative Shampoo
description:
Tahitian Lime
Restorative Shampoo
with
 Tea Tree Oil
Organic Aloe Vera & Vitamin E


For all hair types


Indulge your tresses in a nourishing, botanically rich restorative shampoo. Gentle enough for daily use and wonderful for color treated and chemically processed hair. Gently cleans while restoring natural shine and luster. Infused with natural oils and herbs that pamper and nourish the hair and scalp.


8 Fl Oz

name: Silky Slip Conditioner 8 oz
description:
Silky Slip Conditioner
with 
Organic Aloe Vera 
Kelp and Vitamin B


For all hair types


Treat your hair to the silky elegance of our organic conditioning formula. Gently restores shine, body, and texture to hair, and creates luxurious manageability for all day "great hair". This ultra creamy conditioner provides great slip, which is instrumental in the detangling process.We have combined soluble protein blends, organic aloe vera, and many other proprietary ingredient concentrates to provide you with a truly refined hair conditioning experience. Organic aloe vera soothes the scalp and moisturizes the hair. Kelp revitalizes hair adding luster, body and shine. Vitamin B strengthens the hair shaft and structure while also stimulating hair growth. 


8 Fl Oz

name: African Black Soap Herbal Shampoo with Shea Butter Essential Oils & Vitamin E
description:
African Black Soap
Herbal Shampoo
with
 Shea Butter
Essential Oils & Vitamin E


Achieve clean, moisturized and naturally nourished hair  by immersing your hair in our 100% natural African black soap shampoo. Steeped with herbs and infused with essential oils, this fine blend is guaranteed to cleanse your hair while also adding moisture without stripping it of it's natural oils. 


Directions: Massage a generous amount into wet hair, working lather through to the ends. Rinse thoroughly and proceed to style.

description:
